00026 float OmniDriveTrajectoryGenerator::getShortestAngle(float goalAngle, float actualAngle) {
00027     return atan2(sin(goalAngle - actualAngle), cos(goalAngle - actualAngle));
00028 }
00029 
00030 void OmniDriveTrajectoryGenerator::computeTrajectroy(const std::vector<FrameWithId>& path, KDL::Trajectory_Composite& trajectory) {
00031     std::vector<FrameWithId> pathWithRotation;
00032     interpolateRotation(path, pathWithRotation);
00033     computeTrajectoryComposite(pathWithRotation, trajectory);
00034 }
00035 
00036 
00037 void OmniDriveTrajectoryGenerator::interpolateRotation(const std::vector<FrameWithId>& path, std::vector<FrameWithId>& pathWithRotation) {
00038        
00039     if (path.empty())
00040         return;
00041     
00042     pathWithRotation.clear();
00043     
00044     double r,p,y;
00045     path.front().M.GetRPY(r,p,y);
00046     double start = y;
00047     
00048     path.back().M.GetRPY(r,p,y);
00049     double end = y;
00050     double step = getShortestAngle(end, start) / path.size();
00051 
00052     std::vector<FrameWithId>::const_iterator it;
00053     for (it = path.begin(); it != path.end() - 1; ++it) {
00054         
00055         FrameWithId f;
00056         f.id = it->id;
00057         f.p = it->p;
00058         f.M = KDL::Rotation::RPY(0,0,start);
00059         pathWithRotation.push_back(f);
00060        
00061         start = start + step;
00062      
00063         
00064        // it->pose.orientation = f1.orientation;
00065     }
00066 
00067     pathWithRotation.front() = path.front();
00068     pathWithRotation.back() = path.back();
00069 }
00070 
00071 void OmniDriveTrajectoryGenerator::computeTrajectoryComposite(const std::vector<FrameWithId>& path, KDL::Trajectory_Composite& trajectory) {
00072 
00073     const double maxVel = 0.3;
00074     const double maxAcc = 0.05;
00075 
00076   //  ROS_INFO("Path converted to a trajectory, max velocity: %f m/s, max acceleration: %f m/s^2", maxVel, maxAcc);
00077 
00078     KDL::VelocityProfile_Trap* velocityProfile = new KDL::VelocityProfile_Trap(maxVel, maxAcc);
00079     KDL::Path* copyPath = const_cast<KDL::Path&> (path).Clone(); // Why KDL has no const version of Clone method?
00080     // They force me to do this!
00081 
00082     velocityProfile->SetProfile(0, copyPath->PathLength());
00083     KDL::Trajectory_Segment* trajectorySegment = new KDL::Trajectory_Segment(copyPath, velocityProfile);
00084 
00085     trajectory.Add(trajectorySegment);
00086 
00087 /*    double dt = 1.0;
00088     for (double i = 0; i <= trajectory.Duration() + dt; i = i + dt) {
00089         cout << "pos" << ":" << trajectory.Pos(i).p << endl;
00090         cout << "vel" << ":" << trajectory.Vel(i).vel << endl;
00091         cout << "acc" << ":" << trajectory.Acc(i).vel << endl;
00092         cout << "---" << endl;
00093     }*/
00094     
00095     
00096     return true;
00097 }
